definitions: a difficult task that tests a person's abilities
a problem or situation that needs to be dealt with
examples: She has always enjoyed a challenge, whether it was climbing mountains or swimming with sharks.
The biggest challenge facing us today is climate change.
Solving this puzzle was a real challenge.
The challenge of raising a family can be both rewarding and stressful.
The challenge of poverty is one that we must all work to overcome.

definitions: a colorless, transparent, odorless, tasteless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain and is the basis of the fluids of living organisms.
a liquid that is the basis for bodily fluids and the solvent for many substances.
a liquid that forms part of the hydrosphere.
a small body of liquid, especially one held in a container.
examples: the water was cold and clear
the water was up to my knees
I'll have a glass of water, please
